alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Flagler, south central St. Johns and central Putnam Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 543 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Interlachen to near Andalusia. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, Interlachen, Pomona Park, Hastings, East Palatka, Andalusia, Florahome, Melrose Landing, Orange Mills and Bardin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. For boaters on or near the St Johns River, move to a safe shelter now! Do not be caught on or near the water. Gusty winds and choppy waves are likely. Make sure all on board are wearing life jackets.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; Western Putnam
